It introduces new features and improvements that enhance the functionality and user experience of websites. This documentation provides a comprehensive guide on how to create a content strategy for web pages using HTML5. ### Objective and Scope The objective of this documentation is to help web developers and content creators understand how to structure and organize content using HTML5. It covers the best practices and recommendations for creating effective and user-friendly web pages. The scope of this documentation includes the basic concepts of HTML5, content organization techniques, and guidelines for optimizing content for different devices and platforms. ### Requirements and Pre-requisites To follow this documentation, you need: - A basic understanding of HTML and CSS - A text editor or an integrated development environment (IDE) for writing HTML code - A web browser to test and view the web pages ### Step-by-Step Instructions 1.
